Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add bonus features and comprehensive documentation

Features added:
- Dark/Light mode toggle with localStorage persistence
- Real-time performance metrics tracking for all stages
- Copy to clipboard buttons for answers and final synthesis
- Query history with browser storage \(last 10 queries\)
- Enhanced health dashboard with detailed PC status

Documentation:
- Complete README.md with team info, setup guide, and AI usage statement
- Performance optimizations documented
- Troubleshooting guide included

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
